sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnfilesysmntrng ( file_sys_id , file_sys_nm , file_sys_manage_nm , file_sys_size , file_sys_thrhld , file_sys_usgqty , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , mntrng_sttus , creat_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm ) VALUES ( #fileSysId# , #fileSysNm# , #fileSysManageNm# , #fileSysSize# , #fileSysThrhld# , #fileSysUsgqty# , #mngrNm# , #mngrEmailAdres# , #mntrngSttus# , #creatDt# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnfilesysmntrng SET file_sys_id = #fileSysId# , file_sys_nm = #fileSysNm# , file_sys_manage_nm = #fileSysManageNm# , file_sys_size = #fileSysSize# , file_sys_thrhld = #fileSysThrhld# , file_sys_usgqty = #fileSysUsgqty# , mngr_nm = #mngrNm# , mngr_email_adres = #mngrEmailAdres# , mntrng_sttus = #mntrngSttus# , creat_dt = #creatDt# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND file_sys_id = #fileSysId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnfilesysmntrng WHERE 1 = 1 AND file_sys_id = #fileSysId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT file_sys_id , file_sys_nm , file_sys_manage_nm , file_sys_size , file_sys_thrhld , file_sys_usgqty , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , mntrng_sttus , creat_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM COMTNFILESYSMNTRNG WHERE file_sys_id = #fileSysId#

SELECT A.FILE_SYS_ID , A.FILE_SYS_NM , A.FILE_SYS_MANAGE_NM , A.FILE_SYS_SIZE , A.FILE_SYS_THRHLD , A.FILE_SYS_USGQTY , A.MNGR_NM , A.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES , A.MNTRNG_STTUS , A.CREAT_DT , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM ( SELECT FILE_SYS_ID , FILE_SYS_NM , FILE_SYS_MANAGE_NM , FILE_SYS_SIZE , FILE_SYS_THRHLD , FILE_SYS_USGQTY , MNGR_NM , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES , MNTRNG_STTUS , CREAT_DT , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , ROWNUM FROM COMTNFILESYSMNTRNG WHERE 1=1
FILE_SYS_ID = #searchKeyword#
FILE_SYS_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY FILE_SYS_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNFILESYSMNTRNG WHERE 1=1
FILE_SYS_ID = #searchKeyword#
FILE_SYS_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
